dkSTS:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
dkSTS:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

dkSTS:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
dkSTS:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
dkSTS:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

dkSTS:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
dkSTS:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

dkSTS:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
dkSTS:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !dkSTS:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

dkSTS:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
dkSTS:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !dkSTS:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
